title: Wastewater Treatment with Chlorine or UV

content.question: At what step in the diagram would wastewater most likely be treated with chlorine or <math alttext="U V" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>UV</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> light to remove bacteria?

choices.label: Between steps <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

Between steps <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>D</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe characteristics of an environmental concept, process, or model represented visually.
